scripts.build:p:css: cross-env BUILD_TYPE=desktop NODE_ENV=production parcel build --target desktop:css --no-source-maps --dist-dir output/desktop --no-optimize
scripts.build:p:js: cross-env BUILD_TYPE=desktop NODE_ENV=production parcel build --target desktop:js --no-source-maps --dist-dir output/desktop
scripts.build:m:css: cross-env BUILD_TYPE=mobile NODE_ENV=production parcel build --target css --no-source-maps --dist-dir output/mobile
scripts.build:m:js: cross-env BUILD_TYPE=mobile NODE_ENV=production parcel build --target js --no-source-maps --dist-dir output/mobile
scripts.build:p: cross-env BUILD_TYPE=desktop NODE_ENV=production parcel build --target desktop:all --no-source-maps --dist-dir output/desktop --no-optimize
scripts.build:m: cross-env BUILD_TYPE=mobile NODE_ENV=production parcel build --target all --no-source-maps --dist-dir output/mobile
scripts.build: cross-env BUILD_TYPE=all NODE_ENV=production parcel build 'src/dektop/html/*.html' --no-source-maps --dist-dir output
